content:
From: Jens Doll <jd@cococo.de>
Although my project is progressing, there are some hindrances, which
cost a lot of time. So I have to withdraw announcements

a) Elbe 1.5 will not be published in January 2012
b) the next version is not for one University only
(we have got a dozen of them here in Hamburg, of which I know four of
them ...)

Happy Reasoning,
Jens
